Grand Master Roien:
You worked hard, yet taught the basics of the game. Now you can go on a trip. I want to give you something. You probably already know how to use it?
Now go to Talking Island Village and find the Newbie Guide. He will give you advice. And yet - useful items that will be useful when traveling.
You'll find the Newbie Guide, by clicking the question mark at the bottom right of the screen and follow the pointer. Well, time to go. Good luck!
